    Magical Madeira

    Go Beyond soaks up the sun on this Portuguese Paradise Island

    4th - 11th May 2025

    What's to get excited about!

    A small subtropical volcanic island in the North Atlantic, Madeira is a Portuguese outpost and known for its lush green forests, black pebble beaches and crystal-clear waters.

    Join us on our stay at the exotic Dom Pedro Garajou Hotel (which hosts two swimming pools), near the capital Funchal.

    On this relaxing holiday, we will take time to discover its character in a variety of ways. We will take a kayak out around the nearby beaches, explore the island with a short trek accompanied by a mountain guide, visit the natural Muniz swimming pools in the north of the island, take a boat trip out to see some whales and dolphins and learn more about the historic centre of Funchal with an art museum visit.

    Oh, and one of our days will just be us relaxing around the hotel pools. Bliss!

    Where you'll be staying...

    Dom Pedro Garajau, a 3-star aparthotel, offers a peaceful escape between Funchal and Caniço.

    The hotel has a heated indoor pool and two outdoor pools.

    Nearby, you’ll find Garajau Beach, a great place to relax by the Atlantic.

    Food, glorious food!

    There is a wonderful restaurant based in the hotel where we will be eating, breakfast, lunch and dinner. The restaurant has a terrace that looks over the central pool.

    What you'll experience...

    We will meet at a London airport and you will be supported on the flight to the C Cristiano Ronaldo International Airport in Madeira. Our mini-buses will take you on the 15-minute drive to the hotel.

    Your holiday will include the following:

  • 7 night, full board accommodation.
  • Airport transfers and transport in and around Madeira
  • Return flight from London to Madeira, accompanied and supported by our Go Beyond team.
  • A ratio of 2 guests to 1 Go Beyond support staff member.
  • Support from our Go Beyond team during the holiday.

    • Accessiblility and Inclusion

    Inclusion is important to us so we strive, whenever possible, to make our holidays accessible to all.

    If you wish to discuss your specific access requirement for any of our holidays, please contact us at your earliest convenience and we will do everything we can to welcome you to the Go Beyond Holidays experience.

    Holiday name
    Magical Madeira

    Date
    4th - 11th May 2025

    Nights
    7 nights

    Accommodation
    Dom Pedro Garajau Hotel

    Food
    All food will be catered for by the hotel

    Price
    £3670

    Day 1
    Travel from London to Madeira, travel up to our accommodation via mini bus, settle in.

    Day 2
    Visit Porto Muniz Natural Swimming Pools

    Day 3
    Kayaking around the nearby coast

    Day 4
    Whale and Dolphin boat trip

    Day 5
    Rest Day

    Day 6
    Visit the historic centre of Funchal

    Day 7
    Fabulous guided nature walk

    Day 8
    Drive back to Madeira Airport for flight back to London.
